title: Dirty Dick's Grilled Jerk Chicken Wings
info:
1. Combine all ingredients, except wings, in a sauté pan and bring to a boil. Allow sauce to thicken.

  2. Heat oil in a large skillet or deep fryer to 375ºF. Deep fry chicken wings until done, about 10 minutes. Remove chicken and drain on paper towels.

  3. Toss wings with sauce and garnish with lime wedges.
ingredients:
• 2 ounces Dirty Dick's Hot Sauce
  • 2 ounces agave nectar
  • 1 teaspoon garlic, chopped
  • 1 teaspoon ginger, chopped
  • 1 tablespoon lime juice
  • 1 lime, cut into wedges
  • 1 tablespoon cilantro, chopped
  • 1 pound chicken wings
  • canola oil

title: Cholula Brisket Taco
info:
1 In a bowl, mix brown sugar, chili powder, salt, pepper, smoked paprika, garlic powder, cayenne pepper.

2 In a separate bowl, mix the Cholula Original and mustard. Rub the entire brisket with the mixture, then apply the dry rub on top of that.

3 Smoke the brisket between 225 and 250 degrees Fahrenheit for 7-8 hours, until it reaches an internal temperature of 200 degrees. If you don’t have access to a smoker, you can cook the brisket in a slow cooker on low for 8-10 hours.

4 Remove brisket from smoker and shred with forks.

5 To make pico de gallo, toss tomato, onion and jalapeños together in a bowl.

6 Assemble tacos -- Place brisket, pico de gallo, and a slice of avocado into tortillas. Drizzle with Cholula Original.
ingredients:
• One 5 pound brisket
  • 8 tablespoons brown sugar
  • 1 tablespoon chili powder
  • 3 tablespoon salt
  • 1/2 teaspoon smoked paprika
  • 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
  • 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1/2 teaspoon cayenne
  • 1/2 teaspoon cumin
  • 1/2 cup whole-grain mustard
  • 1/3 cup Cholula® Original Hot Sauce

title: Heartbeat Pineapple Habanero Boom Burger
info:
1 Mix all ingredients and gently pat into thick patties.

2 Grill the burgers for 2 minutes on each side over high heat, then move them to a lower-heat area of the grill. Cook another 2 - 3 minutes for medium-rare burgers, 3 - 4 minutes for medium or 5 - 6 minutes for well-done.

3 Serve on a warm bun with your favorite toppings.
ingredients:
• 1 1/2 pounds ground beef
  • 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 3/4 teaspoon ground cumin
  • 3/4 teaspoon oregano
  • 1/4 cup Heartbeat Pineapple Habanero Hot Sauce, or more to taste
  • 1 tablespoon butter and 1 tablespoon vegetable oil (for grilling burgers)
  • 4 hamburger buns

title: Queen Majesty Red Habanero & Black Coffee Baked Beans
info:
1 Preheat oven to 350ºF.

2 Combine the molasses, ketchup, mustard and Queen Majesty Red Habanero & Black Coffee in large bowl.

3 Sauté bacon until browned and add to bowl.

4 Sauté the onions in the bacon fat until tender then add to ingredients in bowl.

5 Season beans with salt and black pepper and gently toss into molasses mixture.

6 Pour mixture into a baking dish and bake in the oven for 25 minutes.
ingredients:
• 1 onion, diced
  • 1/2 cup molasses
  • 1/2 cup ketchup
  • 1/4 cup Dijon mustard
  • 2 1/2 ounces Queen Majesty Red Habanero & Black Coffee
  • 3 cans Cannelloni beans, 28 ounces, drained and rinsed
  • 8 slices slab bacon, 1/2” dice
  • kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

title: Mad Dog 357 Ribs
info:
1 Mix all dry rub ingredients together with a fork in a metal bowl.

2 Thoroughly coat the ribs with the dry rub.

3 Let the ribs sit for 1 hour at room temperature.

4 Grill ribs over low heat, covered, for 2 - 4 hours.

5 Remove ribs from grill and add as much Mad Dog 357 as you’d like for more flavor.
ingredients:
• 1 rack pork spare ribs
  • 1 1/2 teaspoons salt
  • 1 1/2 tablespoons ground black pepper
  • 1 1/2 tablespoons paprika
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 3 tablespoons brown sugar

title: Hellfire Fiery Fool Chili
info:
1 Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and add in ground beef. Cook and stir until beef is evenly browned, and no longer pink. Discard excess grease.

2 In a large stockpot, sauté the bell pepper and onion in oil until onion turns slightly in color.3 Add in the minced garlic and cooked ground beef and sauté for one minute.

4 Add remaining ingredients - diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, chili powder, cayenne pepper, salt, black pepper, water and Hellfire Fiery Fool into the stockpot.

5 Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low.

6 Simmer ingredients uncovered for approximately 15-20 minutes.

7 Garnish each serving with Cheddar cheese, green onions, and add additional desired amount of Hellfire Fiery Fool, for maximum flavor.
ingredients:
• 2 pounds ground beef
  • 2 (16 ounce) cans kidney beans, rinsed and drained
  • 2 (14.5 ounce) cans diced tomatoes, drained
  • 1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce
  • 2 onions, chopped
  • 1 green bell pepper, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 3 tablespoons chili powder
  • 1 tablespoon cayenne pepper
  • 2 teaspoons salt
  • 1 teaspoon ground black pepper
  • 1/2 cup shredded Cheddar cheese
  • 1/3 cup Hellfire Fiery Fool Hot Sauce
